img_summary: The image depicts "Millenium Ginseng," a rare ingredient in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. According to the surrounding text, it is obtained randomly by collecting "Aged Ginseng." The ingredient is likely used for crafting or gameplay purposes, as it is categorized alongside other uncommon and rare items like Gentian and Jade Lotus.
